description.translate: As impertinent as their privileges are, it would be costly for its owner to get rid of them.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Pouvoir de la duchesse\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§aAussi impertinents que sont leurs privilèges,\"}","{\"text\":\"§ail coûterait à sa détentrice de s'en passer.\"}","{\"text\":\"§aAs impertinent as their privileges are,\"}","{\"text\":\"§ait would be costly for its owner to get rid of them.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7SPD§a1 §7DAR§a1\"}"]}}
